thread.title: Raghava Lawrence to play a corrupt IPS officer
thread.title_full: Raghava Lawrence to play a corrupt IPS officer

author: Deccan
title: Raghava Lawrence to play a corrupt IPS officer
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 11, 2015, 01.00 am Raghava Lawrence After tasting huge success with his horror series Kanchana, Raghava Lawrence recently announced two films — Motta Shiva Ketta Shiva with Kajal Agarwal as his heroine, and the other titled Naga with a king cobra as the central character. Now, it seems the choreographer-turned-actor wants more time to work on his scripts. He has resolved to act in a quick project, which is being produced by RB Choudhary, and Lawrence is restricting himself to acting, as Sai Ramani who earlier helmed the Jiiva-starrer Singam Puli is directing the movie. A remake of Tollywood film Pataas that received good response, Lawrence would reprise Nandamuri Kalyan Ram’s role in the original. Apparently, Lawrence will be also seen in khaki as a corrupt IPS officer in the film. All other details including the two lead heroines and technicians are being worked out. entertainment Kollywood Raghava Lawrence Nandamuri Kalyan Ram Also Read Ajay Devgn saw a different side of Goa during 'Drishyam' Nandamuri Balakrishna reveals age of Lion script Award-winning novel made into a bilingual Finally out! Nageswara Rao, Nagarjuna and Naga Chaitanya's 'Manam' stills
